content: Stocks are on the rise today as the market attempts to rebound after the selloff last week. JPMorgan Chief U.S. Economist Michael Feroli says that both supply and demand are "being constrained" due to the coronavirus. He joins the On the Move panel to discuss.

author: CBS News
title: Fear spreads along with cases of coronavirus
